structure.unit: ARTICLE V. USED MOTOR VEHICLE PARTS DEALERS, WRECKERS AND REBUILDERS

law.catch_line: Failure to submit reports or permit inspection.

text.section:
Sec. 21-58. Failure to submit reports or permit inspection.
It shall be unlawful for any licensee to fail, refuse or neglect to submit any report in the form and manner required by this article or to fail, refuse or neglect to keep records in the form and manner required by this article, or to fail, refuse or neglect to permit inspection of records required hereunder, or of the vehicle or parts to which the records pertain, by any officer or other duly authorized person.
